item.description:
Feature Presentation
Title: USING ROBOTIC TRADING TO TRADE STOCKS by ERIC EKLOF from Vermont

Description: Eric Eklof will show how he uses Robotic Trading to trade stocks. Eric uses "Cool-Trade" fully-automated stock trading software that intelligently filters & trades stocks on it's own while you are at work or on vacation. Cool-Trades "Auto Trader" executes your strategies 100% on its own and trades your logic, applies your rules and thus removes emotions. Eric suggests you check-out the Cool-Trade website prior to the meeting. Find it at: https://www.cool-trad...

Bio: Eric Eklof has been attending our meeting for nine months. Over that period we have all gotten to know him as an upbeat, knowledgeable short-term trader. He is not afraid to volunteer his knowledge and opinion, often pointing out the positive contributions of others.

Please RSVP!

This meeting's agenda will have the following agenda:
- 6:00-7:00 In addition to his feature presentation, Eric Eklof will do a primer on general robotic trading during the premeeting period. This is optional. Open to all.
7:00 - Meeting Begins:
- Group discussion led by Jeff
- Agenda setting for the fall led by Doug
- Technical Analysis update by Harlan
- Stockpicks section
- Feature Presentation by Eric Eklof (see above)

Our members value open discussion highly. We try to pack as much open discussion as possible. Expressing ideas and sharing knowledge is paramount to our members.
All levels of expertise are welcome. No question is too simple - as a matter of fact the simplest question often evokes the best discussion!

If you have friends that you talk stocks with then bring them with you!

Directions:
Location: MIT Building E51. MIT, 70 Memorial Drive, Cambridge, MA, USA.
This building is on the far eastern side of the MIT campus, about a ten minute walk from the main entrance, and about two minutes from the Kendall Square 'T' stop.

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

This is a free meeting. There is no membership required.
item.name: Boston Investors Business Daily Tuesday Meetup
